result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ga: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.html: Ba cheart dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart dó ḃeiṫ sa ḃaile in áit ḃeiṫ ag ól i dtiṫe táḃairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ga: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.orig: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairne
result.html: Ba chóir dó bheith sa bhaile in áit bheith ag ól i dtithe tábhairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir dó ḃeiṫ sa ḃaile in áit ḃeiṫ ag ól i dtiṫe táḃairneHe should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: Agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
